posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a magnificent lot of Old Judge cards that display very nicely.  The Swartwood has some back damage.  The pictures are much nicer than many other Old Judges I've seen, and the condition is exceptional for their grades.  

Swartwood = $300, Fogarty = $300 Krieg = $500 or $1000 after shipping/fees takes all 3!
